${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:BlazingStrike.NAME: Blazing Slash
${modID}:BlazingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard your leftmost card.

${modID}:Chiwen.NAME: Turbulent Blaze
${modID}:Chiwen.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! [${modID}:ScorchIcon] to ALL enemies. NL Take !M! Damage.

${modID}:PrayerofWrath.NAME: Prayer of Wrath
${modID}:PrayerofWrath.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Coda !M!. NL On *Chant : Deal !D! damage to a random enemy.

${modID}:HolySlash.NAME: Holy Slash
${modID}:HolySlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !${modID}:M2! damage. NL Deal !D! [${modID}:HolyIcon] damage. NL Apply !M! [${modID}:SanctifyIcon] ,

${modID}:Dawnlight.NAME: Dawnlight
${modID}:Dawnlight.DESCRIPTION: Deal [${modID}:HolyIcon] damage to all enemies equal to !D! times your ${modID}:Devotion.

${modID}:Charr.NAME: Charr
${modID}:Charr.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! [${modID}:VulnerableIcon] . NL Apply !${modID}:M2! [${modID}:ScorchIcon] to ALL enemies.

${modID}:GuardianStrike.NAME: Guardian Strike
${modID}:GuardianStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Choose 1 of 3 *Inactive *Verses to ${modID}:Chant.

${modID}:ShoulderCheck.NAME: Shoulder Check
${modID}:ShoulderCheck.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have [${modID}:ReinforceIcon] gain [E] [E] and draw a card.

${modID}:MarchofOtherworldlyLight.NAME: Purge the Wicked
${modID}:MarchofOtherworldlyLight.DESCRIPTION: Deal [${modID}:HolyIcon] damage equal to !D! times your ${modID}:Devotion. NL Apply your ${modID}:Devotion plus !M! [${modID}:SanctifyIcon] .

${modID}:RepairArmor.NAME: Repair Armor
${modID}:RepairArmor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! [${modID}:BlockIcon] . NL Remove your [${modID}:FrailIcon] . NL Gain !M! [${modID}:ReinforceIcon] .

${modID}:ThunderousOration.NAME: Thunderous Oration
${modID}:ThunderousOration.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you ${modID}:Chant, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:BeaconofLight.NAME: Beacon of Light
${modID}:BeaconofLight.DESCRIPTION: Creates an additional *Verse when played. NL ${modID}:Coda !M!. NL On *Chant : Gain !B! [${modID}:LightIcon] .

${modID}:sinnerslament.NAME: Sinners Lament
${modID}:sinnerslament.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Coda !M!: Lose !${modID}:M2! HP. NL On *Chant: ALL enemies lose HP equal to twice your ${modID}:Devotion.

${modID}:YieldmyFlesh.NAME: Yield my Flesh
${modID}:YieldmyFlesh.DESCRIPTION: *Chant your next Verse whenever you lose HP during your turn. NL On ${modID}:Coda: Gain !M! [${modID}:LightIcon] .

${modID}:WrathofGod.NAME: Wrath of God
${modID}:WrathofGod.DESCRIPTION: Your current [${modID}:BlockIcon] increases this cards damage. NL Deal !${modID}:WOG! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:SeraphForm.NAME: Seraph Form
${modID}:SeraphForm.DESCRIPTION: The first time you heal each turn, draw a card and deal damage equal to your ${modID}:Devotion to ALL enemies.

${modID}:ExhaleofHoarfrost.NAME: Exhale of Hoarfrost
${modID}:ExhaleofHoarfrost.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! [dragonmod:ChillIcon] to ALL enemies. NL Channel !M! ${modID}:Icicles.

${modID}:FrostyCaltrops.NAME: Frosty Caltrops
${modID}:FrostyCaltrops.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Cantrip. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain a ${modID}:Crystal Orb Slot.

${modID}:Nightrunner.NAME: Nightrunner
${modID}:Nightrunner.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Cantrip. NL Gain !B! [${modID}:BlockIcon] . NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust

${modID}:BladedSleeves.NAME: Bladed Sleeves
${modID}:BladedSleeves.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Cantrip. NL Channel an ${modID}:Icicle. NL Add a *Shiv to your hand.

${modID}:ChillOut.NAME: Chill Out
${modID}:ChillOut.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Temporary [dragonmod:FocusIcon] . NL Next turn, Gain !M! Temporary [dragonmod:FocusIcon] .

${modID}:FrozenRose.NAME: Frozen Rose
${modID}:FrozenRose.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! . NL Add !M! *Shivs to your hand.

${modID}:Frostslash.NAME: Frost Slash
${modID}:Frostslash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL ${modID}:Freeze a random card in your hand.
${modID}:Frostslash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL ${modID}:Freeze a card in your hand.

${modID}:IcicleSpear.NAME: Icicle Spear
${modID}:IcicleSpear.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! [${modID}:RangedIcon] damage to a random enemy for each Channeled ${modID}:Icicle.

${modID}:WisteriaCutter.NAME: Wisteria Slash
${modID}:WisteriaCutter.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Channel !M! ${modID}:Icicles. NL ${modID}:Rimeburst: Gain [E] [E].

${modID}:Feint.NAME: Feint
${modID}:Feint.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! [${modID}:LockonIcon] . NL [#94ff52]Skill[] ${modID}:Gambit: ${modID}:Fire an ${modID}:Icicle.

${modID}:SilverShadow.NAME: Silver Shadow
${modID}:SilverShadow.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! [${modID}:BlockIcon] . NL Gain !M! [${modID}:ReinforceIcon] . NL ${modID}:Rimeburst: Gain !B! [${modID}:BlockIcon] next turn

${modID}:RazorShiv.NAME: Razor Shiv
${modID}:RazorShiv.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply [dragonmod:BleedIcon] equal to the target [${modID}:LockonIcon] .

${modID}:CrystalBarbs.NAME: Crystal Barbs
${modID}:CrystalBarbs.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Channel !M! ${modID}:Icicles. NL Add a *Dazzling *Shiv to your hand.

${modID}:LinkBreak.NAME: Link Break
${modID}:LinkBreak.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! [${modID}:VulnerableIcon] . NL Apply !${modID}:M2! [dragonmod:BleedIcon] .

${modID}:FreezeOver.NAME: Freeze Over
${modID}:FreezeOver.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards and ${modID}:Freeze them. NL You cannot play them this turn.

${modID}:Cryolattice.NAME: Cryolattice
${modID}:Cryolattice.DESCRIPTION: Once per turn after you Remove an ${modID}:Icicle, gain a ${modID}:Crystal Orb Slot.
${modID}:Cryolattice.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Once per turn after you Remove an ${modID}:Icicle, gain !M! ${modID}:Crystal Orb Slots.

${modID}:Rimeshank.NAME: Rimeshank
${modID}:Rimeshank.DESCRIPTION: *Shiv cards deal !M! additional Damage. NL *Shiv cards also apply !${modID}:M2! [dragonmod:BleedIcon] .
${modID}:Rimeshank.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL *Shiv cards deal !M! additional Damage. NL *Shiv cards also apply !${modID}:M2! [dragonmod:BleedIcon] .

${modID}:ExposeWeakpoint.NAME: Expose Weakpoint
${modID}:ExposeWeakpoint.DESCRIPTION: Whenever target enemy takes unblocked damage, they gain !M! [dragonmod:VulnerableIcon] and take !${modID}:M2! additional damage for the turn.

${modID}:DeathlyDispute.NAME: Deathly Dispute
${modID}:DeathlyDispute.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards and ${modID}:Freeze them. NL [#5258ff]Power[] ${modID}:Gambit: Gain !${modID}:M2! Gold and Exhaust.

${modID}:SparklingShiv.NAME: Sparkling Shiv
${modID}:SparklingShiv.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, Gain [dragonmod:SubzeroIcon] equal to targets [${modID}:VulnerableIcon] .

${modID}:FrostyFlash.NAME: Frosty Flash
${modID}:FrostyFlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! [${modID}:RangedIcon] damage and apply !M! [${modID}:LockonIcon] to ALL enemies.

${modID}:RupturingShot.NAME: Rupturing Shot
${modID}:RupturingShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! [${modID}:RangedIcon] damage. NL Apply !M! [dragonmod:BleedIcon] . NL Gain !${modID}:M2! [dragonmod:SubzeroIcon] .

${modID}:ConeofCold.NAME: Cone of Cold
${modID}:ConeofCold.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies Twice. NL Return a random card from your discard pile to your hand and ${modID}:Freeze it.
${modID}:ConeofCold.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies Twice. NL Return !M! random cards from your discard pile to your hand and ${modID}:Freeze them.

${modID}:GatheringStorm.NAME: Gathering Storm
${modID}:GatheringStorm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! [${modID}:BlockIcon] . NL Gain !${modID}:M2! [dragonmod:SubzeroIcon] . NL Gain a ${modID}:Hail Orb slot
${modID}:GatheringStorm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! [${modID}:BlockIcon] . NL Gain !${modID}:M2! [dragonmod:SubzeroIcon] . NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Hail Orb slots.

${modID}:FractalShell.NAME: Fractal Arrow
${modID}:FractalShell.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! [${modID}:RangedIcon] damage. NL Channel an ${modID}:Icicle. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Crystal Orb Slots

${modID}:FrozenSilent.NAME: Frosty Silence
${modID}:FrozenSilent.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! [${modID}:BlockIcon] . NL Draw a card. NL ${modID}:Rimeburst: ${modID}:Freeze a card and put it on the bottom of your draw pile. It costs 0 until played.
${modID}:FrozenSilent.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! [${modID}:BlockIcon] . NL Draw a card. NL ${modID}:Rimeburst: ${modID}:Freeze !M! cards and put them on the bottom of your draw pile. They costs 0 until played.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Place on the bottom of you draw pile

${modID}:StreetRink.NAME: Street Rink
${modID}:StreetRink.DESCRIPTION: Channel ${modID}:Sleet. NL Apply !${modID}:M2! [${modID}:VulnerableIcon] . NL ${modID}:Freeze a random card in your hand.
${modID}:StreetRink.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel !M! ${modID}:Sleet. NL Apply !${modID}:M2! [${modID}:VulnerableIcon] to ALL enemies. NL ${modID}:Freeze a random card in your hand

${modID}:PillarofFrost.NAME: Pillar of Frost
${modID}:PillarofFrost.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! [${modID}:BlockIcon] . NL Gain !M! Temporary [dragonmod:FocusIcon] . NL Gain !M! [dragonmod:SubzeroIcon] .

${modID}:IceBarrier.NAME: Ice Barrier
${modID}:IceBarrier.DESCRIPTION: This cards [${modID}:BlockIcon] gain is increased by [dragonmod:ChillIcon] on enemies. NL Gain !B! [${modID}:BlockIcon] . NL Gain !M! [${modID}:ReinforceIcon]

${modID}:DiamondDust.NAME: Diamond Dust
${modID}:DiamondDust.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! [${modID}:BlockIcon] . NL Deal !D! damage and apply !M! [dragonmod:ChillIcon] to ALL enemies.

${modID}:ManipStrings.NAME: Manip Strings
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: cards to Add to hand, discard the rest
Choose a card to add a Time Counter to
